person.persName: Francis Marion Heavrin (Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Artelia Ann Felix Heaverin in Ohio County, Kentucky, on June 9, 1858. Father of Musker S. Heaverin, Cicero Maxwell Heavrin, Mary A. Heavrin, and William R. Heavrin. Farmer in Ohio County in 1863.
